field.name: maxChars
field.label: Max. characters
field.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in this field.

field.name: sort_by
field.label: Sort by
field.description: Select the sorting method when presenting the available tags.

field.name: searchOperator
field.label: Search Operator
field.description: Select how results are being returned when searching against this field. Selecting 'Match All' will return listings matching all selected elements/values. Selecting 'Match Any' will return listings matching any one of the selected elements/values.
